alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MASON, ROBERTSON, BRACKEN, PENDLETON, SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Falmouth, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Georgetown, Falmouth, Ripley, Augusta, Felicity, Brooksville, Morgan, Hamersville, Dover, Higginsport, Moscow, Germantown, Neville, Chilo, Browning Corner, Bradford, Stonewall, Powersville and Point Isabel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
